sermons.title: Acquiring A Heart Of Wisdom
sermons.preacher_description:
Zac Poonen ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Zac Poonen in mp3 format. God called brother Zac Poonen to a new work early on in his Christian experience. The movement is now called Christian Fellowship Churches where the New Covenant of New Testament Christianity is clearly preached. 

Brother Zac Poonen has written 25 books most of them being on the deeper Christian life. Many of these have been translated into a number of languages and have been circulated widely around the world. He clearly and passionately shares the  narrow way of Christian discipleship that is neglected by so many modern preachers.

sermons.title: Lord, We Need Wisdom!
sermons.preacher_description:
Bishop Thaddeus Barnum
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Bishop Thaddeus Barnum in mp3 format. Thad was consecrated in Denver, Colorado by Archbishop Emmanuel Kolini, June 24, 2001. Thad currently serves both as Bishop in Residence at All Saints, Pawleys Island, SC, and as a Chaplain to Clergy.  He has a passion for discipleship and through the ministry of Call 2 Disciple, Erilynne and Thad have given themselves to strengthening the Church in the Scriptures and discipling Christians to maturity in the faith.

Thad has served churches in Connecticut, Pennsylvania and South Carolina and has been married to Erilynne for 35 years. They raised 4 girls and have 11 grandchildren.

sermons.title: Road to Reality - Words of Wisdom Acts 13 - Part 1
sermons.description: In this inspiring message, K.P. challenges us to walk away from the things of the world and abandon ourselves to be used by God for His purposes.
sermons.preacher_description:
K.P. Yohannan ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker K.P. Yohannan in mp3 format. Dr. K.P. Yohannan, the Metropolitan Bishop of Believers Church, was born and brought up in Niranam, Kerala. Niranam has immense historical significance in the tradition of Saint Thomas, a disciple of Jesus Christ who planted the first church there in AD 52.  K.P. Yohannan dedicated his life to God at a young age to serve the needy and downtrodden. He prayed, â€œOh my Lord, let my heart break with the things that break Your heartâ€ and his life was never the same. Itâ€™s his belief that one can only demonstrate Godâ€™s love by loving people. After over four decades of selfless service, he says, I have no regrets in praying that prayer for I know God has touched millions through what He did in and through me. It is all Godâ€™s grace.

He spent the early years of his service in North India and traveled to the remote villages sharing the love of Christ and doing charitable works. Through numerous encounters during those years, he was instilled with an increasing passion to bring hope, peace, and comfort to the needy and deprived. His sacrificial commitment, farsightedness and aptitude to perceive helped him to lead a life of unhindered devotion to serve Christ and His church. K.P. Yohannan is also the voice of Athmeeya Yathra, touching millions through his daily radio and TV broadcasts. His 250 books offer practical and spiritual guidance on hundreds of subjects.

sermons.description: K.P. continues to encourage us to let our lives be poured out for God's purposes.

sermons.title: The Benefits of Wisdom
sermons.preacher_description:
Chuck Smith (1927 - 2013)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Chuck Smith in mp3 format. Pastor Chuck was used in the Jesus People revival where he was used along with others to minister to the hippy young people. They saw a work of the Spirit where many were added to the church and discipled. He has raised up many pastors who are a part of the Calvary Chapel movement now and where he pastors the large Costa Mesa church in California.

The Calvary Chapel movement is based of simple principles that Chuck Smith taught over the years such as: The priority of agape love, Simple fellowship amongst the saints, the breaking of bread, the teaching of God's word chapter by chapter and verse by verse. And lastly and most importantly the principle not by might nor by power but by my spirit saith the Lord.

sermons.title: The Danger of Dissing Lady Wisdom
The Pursuit of Wisdom
sermons.description: From the life of Daniel, Art examines where he obtained his wisdom, and why it could be recognized by a pagan civilization.
sermons.preacher_description:
Art Katz (1929 â€“ 2007)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Art Katz in mp3 format. He was radically converted by reading the New Testament. God used him to have a powerful prophetic insight into the end-times and the coming suffering of the jewish people before the great accepting of Jesus as Messiah. His eschatological insight is a very needful truth to be realized in the body of Christ. 

Art was a prophetic voice insofar as he called his listeners to purposes in God that would affect both time and eternity, purposes that had to do with the glory of God in the Church.   Frequently, his messages called the Church to an awareness of the Last Days [End-times] in such a way that made that time seem imminent and at the door.

sermons.title: The Wisest Man Who Ever Lived
sermons.preacher_description:
Carter Conlon ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Carter Conlon in mp3 format. Carter Conlon is the Senior Pastor of Times Square Church. David Wilkerson is the Founding Pastor of Times Square Church. God called Brother Carter to full-time ministry in Canada by faith and He has been serving the Lord with the same faith till this day. 

God has used brother Carter Conlon to preach across the world at pastors conferences and evangelism crusades. He has also recently written 2 books with the newest title: "Fear Not" in which he is strengthening the body of Christ for what is coming upon the world in the end-times.

sermons.title: Who Is a Wise Man?
sermons.description: Does your walk talk what your talk talks? Wisdom is seen in the fruit of a life. A clear teaching on heavenly wisdom versus earthly wisdom from verses 13-18 in James 3.

sermons.title: Wisdom To Live By
sermons.preacher_description:
Jim Cymbala (1949 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Jim Cymbala in mp3 format. Brother Jim Cymbala was called into ministry without formal training in Brooklyn, New York to pastor a small gathering. God showed him the great need of prayer and depending on the work of the Holy Spirit in the ministry. God blessed and grew the brooklyn tabernacle to a large church of thousands because of this reliance.

The burden of his ministry is to show the vital need for prayer, deependence on God and that God uses the weak and lowly to build His kingdom. He has written many books including the best-selling: "Fresh Wind, Fresh Fire" and his newer book "Spirit Rising" speaking of the neglected work of the Holy Spirit in our churches these days.

sermons.title: Wisdom's Cry
sermons.description: Wisdom cries out and utters her voice in the streets. Wisdom cries out to the simple ones so that men would turn from their evil ways and be filled with God’s presence. Wisdom has built a perfect house and this perfect house is the body of Christ. This house send forth messengers who have the same cry as does the heart of Christ for men that were created in the image of God. Wisdom is demonstrated in godly passion for the lost. If the wisdom of God has been planted in us then the passion in the heart of God becomes our passion.
